description: This pie is packed full of crunchy veg and savoury flavours.
name: Turkey & Leek Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped
1 medium egg, cracked and lightly beaten

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry all the veg for 7 minutes while tossing. Chop up the cooked turkey and add to the pan with the herbs, seasoning and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add butter and plain flour. Add the stock and allow to simmer for 10 minutes until the stock starts to reduce. Once the stock has reduced, remove from the heat and transfer to a large baking tray.
Cover the ingredients in the rolled pastry and brush the pastry with the egg. Bake in the oven for 60 minutes and allow to cool slightly before serving.
